segments.text: Kate , you never believe what's happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Masha and Hero are getting divorced .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't really know , but I heard that they are having a separation for 2 months , and filed for divorce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really surprising . I always thought they are well matched . What about the kids ? Who get custody ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Masha , it seems quiet and makable , no quarrelling about who get the house and stock and then contesting the divorce with other details worked out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the change from all the back stepping we usually hear about . Well , I still can't believe it , Masha and Hero , the perfect couple . When would they divorce be final ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Early in the New Year I guess .
segments.speaker: S1
